statements: SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) FROM students GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC, grade ASC
SELECT course_name, grade FROM students WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY grade DESC
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students WHERE student_id = 5 OR course_id = 102
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade IN ('A+', 'B-')
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, course_name FROM students ORDER BY course_name
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, student_gpa FROM students ORDER BY student_gpa DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_major FROM students WHERE student_age < 25 ORDER BY student_age ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_major, student_gpa FROM students WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_major, student_gpa FROM students WHERE student_gpa >= 3.5;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_major FROM students WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_major, student_gpa FROM students WHERE student_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25 AND student_major IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_major, student_gpa FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 AND student_gpa >= 3.0 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours >= 3;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM Courses ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, grade_date FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90 AND grade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE Students.age > 20;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS num_students FROM Courses JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, department, admission_year FROM Students WHERE admission_year > 2019;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Grades ON Enrollments.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, admission_year ASC;
SELECT student_name, department FROM Students WHERE admission_year > 2019;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students s INNER JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id INNER JOIN Grades g ON e.enrollment_id = g.enrollment_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students s INNER JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, department, department AS course_department FROM Students s INNER JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id INNER JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, enrollment_date FROM Students ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours, department FROM Courses WHERE credit_hours > 3;
SELECT professor_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM Professors ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, grade FROM Enrollments WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 80 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND enrollment_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;

SELECT * FROM Enrollments INNER JOIN Students ON Enrollments.student_id = Students.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.grade >= 70 AND Courses.credit_hours > 3;
SELECT professor_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM Professors WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
